scalar Date

type Query

type Mutation

enum ChallengeStatus {
  DRAFT
  PROPOSED
  PUBLISHED
  REJECTED
  DELETED
}

type Challenge {
  id: ID!
  updated: Date!
  published: Date
  title: String!
  description: String!
  author: User!
  authorId: ID!
  status: ChallengeStatus!
  setupCode: String!
  testCode: String!
  draftSolution: String
  tags: [String!]!
  solutions: [Solution!]
  upvotes: Int
  downvotes: Int
  rejectionReason: String
}

type CreateChallengeResult {
  challenge: Challenge
  result: Result!
}

enum Role {
  USER
  CREATOR
  PUBLISHER
  MODERATOR
  ADMINISTRATOR
}

directive @auth(
  role: Role = USER
) on OBJECT | FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @rateLimit(
  max: Int,
  window: String,
  message: String,
  identityArgs: [String],
  arrayLengthField: String
) on FIELD_DEFINITION

extend type Query {
  """
  Get a challenge by ID
  """
  getChallenge(
    id: ID!
  ): Challenge

  """
  Get list of published challenges
  """
  getChallenges: [Challenge!]!

  """
  Get list of proposed challenges
  """
  getProposedChallenges: [Challenge!]!
}

type Solution {
  authorId: ID!
  author: User!
  timestamp: Date!
  size: Int!
  code: String
  challengeId: ID!
  challenge: Challenge!
}

type User {
  id: ID!
  githubId: Int!
  name: String!
  challenges: [Challenge!]!
  solutions: [Solution!]!
}
